name: Allies Sky Raiders WW2: 1942 Iron Storm in Air Force Empires Free
name_original: Allies Sky Raiders WW2: 1942 Iron Storm in Air Force Empires Free
description:
** Allies Sky Raiders WW2 Iron **

** WORLD WAR 2 AIRPLANE GAME! **

** EXPLOSIONS!!! INTENSE SHOOTING!!! **

It is year 1942 and world war 2 airplane battles are fierce!

German, Japanese, American and British planes are flying around and shooting each other over the sea!!

Hurry, my friend! Take the combat plane and fly to the sky!

The only way to survive this battle is by shooting the enemy planes!

In this game you have:

* Leaderboards (Compare your score to others)
* Shooting! ( Shoot! Shoot! Shoot!)
* Extreme explosions!
* Easy controls
* Action movie feeling!
* Turbo!
* Authentic world war 2 airplane models!

Will you survive?
